pr_title: Support creation of user components through Arc in Hibernate ORM and Hibernate Search

timeline.message:
Support instantiation of JPA AttributeConverters through Arc

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>

Test ORM attribute converters

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>

Support bean references in Hibernate Search config and remove reflection registration

We don't need to register reflection since these components are created
during static init.

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>

Test various types of bean references in Hibernate Search configuration

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>

Document bean references for Hibernate Search configuration

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>

Mark the Hibernate Search extension as stable

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>

timeline.bodyText: Ok, I'm not entirely sure this will be safe enough and if, at some point, we will have to release the beans and then reinitialize them. Let's get this in and we will see if it ends up being an issue.
timeline.author: gsmet
